body_html: I am a TD in a 3D animation studio and we use Maya as main 3D software. Just now, all the industry software use Python2.7.x, so i have to build it from source, with the Maya version Python. Will pytorch for 2.7 support be Droped and when? The using of Python2.7 in our studio will get to keep on at least 2 years, on Maya will use Python2.7 for a long time.

body: I am a TD in a 3D animation studio and we use Maya as main 3D software. Just now, all the industry software use Python2.7.x, so i have to build it from source, with the Maya version Python. Will pytorch for 2.7 support be Droped and when?  The using of Python2.7 in our studio will get to keep on at least 2 years, on Maya will use Python2.7 for a long time.
